data.title: U.S. Americans who identify as LGBT by generation 2023
data.meta_description: In 2023, 9.8 percent of Millennials in the United States stated that they identify as LGBT, while in 2012, less than six percent of respondents from the same generation said the same.
data.text:
LGBT identification in the U.S. 2012-2023, by generation

Published by Statista Research Department,

Share of respondents who identified as lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender in the United States from 2012 to 2023, by generation
